mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TCOMBLCM ( APPL_ID , FUNCTION_ID , ITEM_ID , VALUE , NOTES , LAST_OP_ID , LAST_DATE , LAST_TIME ) VALUES ( #{applId} , #{functionId} , #{itemId} , #{value} , #{notes} , #{lastOpId} , curdate() , curtime() )
mapper.update: UPDATE TCOMBLCM SET VALUE = #{value} , NOTES = #{notes} , LAST_OP_ID = #{lastOpId} , LAST_DATE = curdate() , LAST_TIME = curtime() WHERE APPL_ID = #{applId} AND FUNCTION_ID = #{functionId} AND ITEM_ID = #{itemId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TCOMBLCM WHERE APPL_ID = #{applId} AND FUNCTION_ID = #{functionId} AND ITEM_ID = #{itemId}
mapper.select: SELECT APPL_ID AS "applId" , FUNCTION_ID AS "functionId" , ITEM_ID AS "itemId" , VALUE AS "value" , NOTES AS "notes" , LAST_OP_ID AS "lastOpId" , LAST_DATE AS "lastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "lastTime" FROM TCOMBLCM WHERE APPL_ID = #{applId} AND FUNCTION_ID = #{functionId} AND ITEM_ID = #{itemId}

SELECT APPL_ID AS "applId" , FUNCTION_ID AS "functionId" , ITEM_ID AS "itemId" , VALUE AS "value" , NOTES AS "notes" , LAST_OP_ID AS "lastOpId" , LAST_DATE AS "lastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "lastTime" FROM TCOMBLCM WHERE APPL_ID = #{applId} AND FUNCTION_ID = #{functionId} AND ITEM_ID = #{itemId} FOR UPDATE

SELECT APPL_ID AS "applId" , FUNCTION_ID AS "functionId" , ITEM_ID AS "itemId" , VALUE AS "value" , NOTES AS "notes" , LAST_OP_ID AS "lastOpId" , LAST_DATE AS "lastDate" , LAST_TIME AS "lastTime" FROM TCOMBLCM WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY APPL_ID, FUNCTION_ID, ITEM_ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
